name: i'm lost (itch) (LoOOoLq8)
description: Face your absoute darkest fears. "I'M Lost" is a single player game where the player is stuck in a haunted place where his only weapon is a camera. The player 's objective is to unite the trapped soul with her lost body. The player's only way to achieve his goal is to figure out the clue's written on a blackboard in the form of riddles. Photos of the clues are then taken to the trapped soul who will solve them for the player in his quest needs to reunite her with her body.
